about_the_game:
October 2023 Game Update English Translation - I hope you enjoy your gameplay!
All assets used in the game are legally licensed. More detailed information can be found at the bottom of the store page.

Plot Summary:

Nick travels to "Knabi" in search of the "Golden Wing."
Upon his arrival, he immediately faces trouble but is assisted by a woman named Leslie.
After punishing the wrongdoers and winning first place in the arena, the swordswoman Josephine falls for him.
He also meets Pandora, an exceptionally charming casino owner,
and as he searches for items, he uncovers one conspiracy after another hidden within the town.

Character Introductions:

Leslie：

A woman with a strong sense of justice. She might seem serious at first, but she's very sweet to those she cares about.

Josephine：

A formidable swordswoman. While she appears dominant, she also has a gentle side.

Pandora：

The heiress to a casino empire. She's distinguished and alluring, and during her quest to seek the protagonist's protection, she finds love.

Game Features:

  • Join the protagonist on his adventures and find love along the way.
  • An easy-to-learn yet strategic turn-based combat system.
  • Unique job classes with distinctive skills. Each class possesses powerful finishing moves.
  • Monsters that can be dodged by positioning, offering relatively free combat choices.
  • An equipment crafting system, enhancing the gaming experience.

Update on October 15th, 2022: Previously, we had provided a statement about licensed assets on the game's store page. There's also a more detailed description of these assets in the game's Credit file. However, they might not have been noticeable enough, leading to some misunderstandings. Here's a more detailed clarification:
All assets in this game (art, music, programming, and everything else) are 100% licensed for commercial use or created by me. Some of the character portraits and CGs are products of Gee-kun soft (from booth store, Fanza store, and the official RPG Maker store, all licensed for commercial use). Some CGs are commissioned from pixiv (licensed for commercial use), and other art assets also come from legitimate stores (licensed for commercial use). For more authors, please refer to the in-game Credit file. If there are any further questions, you can contact me on ci-en or email me.

content_descriptors.notes:
- This game contains some sexual innuendos, depictions of kissing and flirting, and sexy and revealing clothing.
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old.
